channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest and Heretic (Social)
channel.description:
So people really seem to like Maid Spy.
However, putting it on Noble muddies an otherwise streamlined class. By bringing back the Priest as a Social Class, this problem can be helped significantly by dedicating the Noble to vote control and the Priest to whispers and social protection, two areas no Social class truly covers in any meaningful way.
Here's my basic idea for that Priest. Linked below, you will find my Noble suggestion, which no longer has Maid Spy. I think this has a lot of potential to fix a bunch of issues in one go, so please let me know what you think of both of these suggestions. Thanks.
># **[color=steblue]Priest[/color]** > **[color=steblue]Blue Dragon[/color] Social** > >**Confessions (Passive)** - Each night you will hear the confessions of a random player. They may speak to you, but you will not know who they are or be able to respond. **Devout (Passive)** - Your voice may not be tampered with. (Icy Touch, Distract, Trollbox, etc. will not work on you) **Contrition (Day)** - You choose who you will speak to for Confessions tonight - 2 uses **Anoint (Night)**- Protect your target from any Social manipulation tomorrow (includes Decide Fate) - unlimited uses **Intercession (Night)** - You may choose a player to intercede with, allowing you to hear all whispers they send or recieve until you select a different target (you may not target the King) - unlimited uses
># **[color=purple]Heretic[/color]** >**[color=purple]Unseen[/color] Social** > >**Hearsay (Passive)** - As long as you are alive, the Unseen will have a seperate chat tab with which to talk during the day. **Dogma (Passive)** - Your voice may not be tampered with. (Icy Touch, Distract, Trollbox, etc. will not work on you.) **Impersonate (Day)** - Your next whisper will secretly appear to be from your target, they will secretly be unable to send or recieve whispers until this occurs - 2 uses **Inquisition (Day)** - Your target will confess to you tonight - 2 uses **Indulgence (Night)**- Protect your target from any Social manipulation tomorrow (includes Decide Fate) - unlimited uses **Trespass (Night)** - You may choose two players to spy on, allowing you to hear all whispers they send or recieve until you select a different target (you may not target the King) - unlimited uses
># **[color=steblue]Noble[/color] and [color=purple]Aristocrat[/color]** >https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-noble-and-aristocrat-social/28119
Points of potential improvement: -Confessions is unique and cool, but not very effective at any single task in most scenarios. Contrition and Inquisition, however, are much more likely to be useful. -Do you prefer unlimited, single-target whisper reading, or limited, multi-target whisper reading? -Open to further suggestions/improvements. Don't be afraid to be harsh!

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest and Heretic (Social)
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NightX:

Call the Dead is the same Psychic ability.

There is nothing wrong with 2 classes having the same ability.

NightX:

Gravedigger is a weaker version of that.

Gravedigger is for if Call The Dead is too powerful.

NightX:

Recognition gives you instant knowledge of Prince and Psychic, so if you are Heretic you know who to kill.

That’s the point.

NightX:

As for night chat, if you hear night chat, there is 3 possibilities: Psychic, Prince, or evil

They could also be jailed or linked.

NightX:

No evil in their right mind claims Prince, and Psychic is uncommon claim. If they claim anything besides Prince/Psychic/Linked/Jailed, you know they are evil. If you are Heretic, it’s just find the Prince/Psychic, which isn’t as useful as Marshal’s probe.

You’re forgetting that it only has 2 uses. If you use it randomly, then you have a high chance of it being useless. If you use on a suspicious person, then that’s their fault as other people probably realize that they could be evil.

NightX:

Why have a weaker version of Psychic’s ability?

Confessions is also weaker. It’s only advantage is allowing evils to give info without revealing themselves.

orangeandblack5:

Also, I dislike the idea of Recognition as a passive. It makes finding Prince way too easy.

Then what else would work? Confessions would be fine if the entire class was based around it, which this isn’t.

As for night chat, if you hear night chat, there is 3 possibilities: Psychic, Prince, or evil. No evil in their right mind claims Prince, and Psychic is uncommon claim. item.title: [Class Suggestion] Priest and Heretic (Social)
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

But seeing their night chat is investigative, not social.

Snoop and the listening to night chats are actually both social abilities. They depend on the player, not the class or their actions

orangeandblack5:

As for your RNG edit, sure, suggest something

Here's a few possible passives to replace it:
Recognition(name isn't final)

  • Chats will never be anonymous to you

  • This means that you will know who the prince and psychic are when they anonymously speak

Call the dead

Can talk to the dead at night

Gravedigger

Can hear the dead at night

orangeandblack5:

The issue is, it’s only anonymous if it’s random.

It’s too weak if it is anonymous though, unless the entire class is based around it(which it isn’t, but I would be fine with the RNG if it was). Plus it also doesn’t fit the theme of your priest, which is hearing whispers. Maybe give the confessions ability to another class and make it based off of that?

orangeandblack5:

If it’s not anonymous, it’s Psychic.

Exactly. Even without the RNG, it’s still similar to psychic.

NightX:

Don’t let this hear night chat. That makes it too easy to find cult/unseen.

Not really. If you use it on a suspected cult/unseen, then other players probably suspect them to, which means that they’ll get killed soon. And if they use the ability randomly, it will be wasteful since it only has 2 uses and not a lot of players have night chats.
